testcase.system-out: When Verify The app is opened...............................................passed And user opens the article..................................................passed Then user should see the nav bar on top of the page.........................passed

testcase.name: User should be able tap on search icon
Open app and access homepage and assert that Top News section is displayed.

testcase.name: Open app and access homepage and assert that Share button in HomePage is functional

testcase.name: Verify that when a user access Watch menu, then watch landing screen will be displayed
testcase.system-out: When Verify The app is opened...............................................passed When user click the menu on homepage........................................passed And user click the watch button.............................................passed Then Verify that watch landing screen is displayed..........................passed
